subject: numeracy
learning_outcomes: Count confidently to 100 and read/write numbers to 100
Understand place value for tens and ones
Perform addition and subtraction within 100 using concrete methods
Recognise, name and describe common 2D and simple 3D shapes
Use simple measurement tools and compare lengths and masses
Begin to solve one-step word problems using numbers to 100
Understand basic concepts of halves and quarters in practical contexts
topics: Addition and subtraction strategies with manipulatives
Measurement: length, mass using standard and non-standard units
Introduction to simple fractions (1/2, 1/4) through sharing activities
